definition: To come into view or become visible, often referring to the appearance of something or someone in a specific context. It is commonly used to describe the act of appearing or showing up in a public setting, such as an event, gathering, or performance.

examples.english: He appears on time for the party.

examples.german: Das Buch wird nächste Woche erscheinen.
examples.english: The book will be published next week.

examples.german: Sie lässt sich nur selten in der Öffentlichkeit erscheinen.

examples.english: The sun appears on the horizon.

examples.german: Er lässt sich nicht gerne vor Publikum erscheinen.
examples.english: He doesn't like to appear in front of an audience.
